title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When a file that is already open in an editor is selected, and the user chooses to open it with a different type of editor using 'Open With...', the file should be reopened with the selected editor.
EB: Currently, when a file that is already open in an editor is selected, choosing 'Open With...' and selecting a different editor has no effect. The file remains open in the original editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'
3. When the editor used is the scripted resource editor example, select 'test.xml' in the Navigator
4. Choose 'Open With...' -> 'Default Text Editor'
Expected result: The file 'test.xml' should be opened in a new editor, as the editor type is different.
Actual result: Nothing happens, and the scripted resource editor example remains active. 

NOTES: Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types.
